title: PREMIERE: UNFOLD – PARRA FOR CUVA
content:
When one thinks of Germany the tropical waves and simmering sun of the Caribbean likely never come to mind, which makes the new video from Parra for Cuva all the more transcendent. The Berlin-based, German-born producer is unveiling his meditative new video for premiere track, “Unfold,” off his forthcoming album, Majouré, exclusively in the U.K. with CitR. While beat makers from Berlin rarely need a stamp of approval—their sounds are almost always top notch—we would put our money behind this one. His wicked “Wicked Games” cover with Anna Naklab is still giving us chills. The video above is for anyone still loathing summer’s end and in need of a quick getaway.

Keep up with Parra for Cuva here
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d20
